text: Haridra Nadhi is the largest temple tank in India, may be in the World. It is in Mannargudi, Thiruvarur District of Tamil Nadu. This temple tank belongs to Sethubhava Swami mutt having Sri Venugopala Swami Temple at its centre. The area of the temple tank is . The Rajagopalaswamy temple is a Vaishnavite temple of the main god Rajagopalaswamy (Krishna). The tank is also called the sister of river Kaveri and is sacred to Vaishnavates. ==References== Category:Temple tanks in India
title: Haridra Nadhi
